comments.body:
I'm not sure why

```ts
import * as wrapSuperagent from 'superagent-retry-delay';
```

doesn't work, but it complains that

```
This module can only be referenced with ECMAScript imports/exports by turning on the 'esModuleInterop' flag and referencing its default export.
```

even though it's using `export =` (just like `@types/superagent`) ðŸ¤·
